original: @159a / gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @159a / gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Yamantaka.

original: gnod spyin mo la sogs pa de rnams kyi mthus /
analyzed: gnod spyin mo la sogs pa de rnams kyi mthus /
translated: By the power of those yakshini and so forth,

original: nyi ma re la ji tsam lag tu blangs pa de @159b thams cad gsog 'jog mi bya bar longs spyad cing zad par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma re la ji tsam lag tu blangs pa de @159b thams cad gsog 'jog mi bya bar longs spyad cing zad par bya'o //
translated: whatever one takes in hand each day, one should enjoy it all without saving or storing it, and one should exhaust it.

original: gzhan la yang mi bshad do //
analyzed: gzhan la yang mi bshad do //
translated: One should not tell others.

original: de ltar ma byas na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma byas na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does not do it that way, one will not succeed.

original: de dag thams cad kyi dam tshig phyag rgya so sor gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyi dam tshig phyag rgya so sor gsungs pa'o //
translated: The pledges of each of them are taught individually.

original: yang na de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rigs kho nas 'dug pas /
analyzed: yang na de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rigs kho nas 'dug pas /
translated: Or, since all of them are included in the vajra family alone,

original: rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya kho na bya ba ni thams cad la khyad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya kho na bya ba ni thams cad la khyad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: one should do only the mudra of the vajra family, because there is no difference with respect to all of them.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni //
translated: Having made the vajra-binding,

original: khros pa'i bsam pas bcing bar bya //
analyzed: khros pa'i bsam pas bcing bar bya //
translated: one should bind with an angry thought.

original: mthe bo rdo rje brtan pas mnan //
analyzed: mthe bo rdo rje brtan pas mnan //
translated: The thumb is pressed with a firm vajra.

original: 'di ni khro bo'i phyag rgyar dran //
analyzed: 'di ni khro bo'i phyag rgyar dran //
translated: This is known as the mudra of the angry one.

original: zhes so // 'di rnams kyi rim pa ji lta bas lan bdun tshun chad kyis gal te ma grub na de'i tshe khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes so // 'di rnams kyi rim pa ji lta bas lan bdun tshun chad kyis gal te ma grub na de'i tshe khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags sbyar te /
translated: If one does not succeed by this method up to seven times, then one should apply the mantra of the King of Wrathful Ones.

original: stong phrag rtog pa las gsungs pa'i grangs kyi nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong phrag rtog pa las gsungs pa'i grangs kyi nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will succeed by the number of recitations taught in the Ko·π≠ƒ´vy≈´ha.

original: de la sbyar ba ni /
analyzed: de la sbyar ba ni /
translated: The application is as follows:

original: aom ya m'anta ka aom bho ga ba ti sv'a h'a h'um /
analyzed: aom ya m'anta ka aom bho ga ba ti sv'a h'a h'um /
translated: O·πÉ yamƒÅntaka o·πÉ bhagavatƒ´ svƒÅhƒÅ h≈´·πÉ.

original: de bzhindu gzhan gyi yang sngags rnams sbyar la bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhindu gzhan gyi yang sngags rnams sbyar la bzlas par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should apply the mantras of the others and recite them.

original: de ltar byas kyang ma grub na /
analyzed: de ltar byas kyang ma grub na /
translated: If one does not succeed even by doing that,

original: bdag gis byas pa'i gnod spyin ma'i mngon rtogs kyi tshul gyis 'dir bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis byas pa'i gnod spyin ma'i mngon rtogs kyi tshul gyis 'dir bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: one should practice this according to the rite of the Yak·π£i·πáƒ´ that I have composed.

original: de bzhin du gzhan gyi yang bya ba dang spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las bstan pa'i sgrub thabs thams cad /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan gyi yang bya ba dang spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las bstan pa'i sgrub thabs thams cad /
translated: In the same way, one should practice all the methods of practice taught in the Action, Performance, and Yoga tantras of others.

original: dpal gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas bsnyen pa bskyal ba dang / dgug pa la sogs pa dang mchod pa rnams cho ga bzhin du byas te /
analyzed: dpal gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas bsnyen pa bskyal ba dang / dgug pa la sogs pa dang mchod pa rnams cho ga bzhin du byas te /
translated: The yogin of glorious YamƒÅri should perform the approach recitation, the summoning and so forth, and the offerings according to the rite, and

original: bsgom pas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom pas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: he should accomplish it by meditation.

original: de las skyon bzlas pas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de las skyon bzlas pas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: From that, he should accomplish it by recitation.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i nang nas gsungs pa'i sgrub thabs thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i nang nas gsungs pa'i sgrub thabs thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said that all the sƒÅdhanas taught in the Great Yoga should be accomplished.

original: de'i phyir na theg pa gzhan la yang gnas pa'i sgrub thabs sgrub par byed pa la the tshom du mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na theg pa gzhan la yang gnas pa'i sgrub thabs sgrub par byed pa la the tshom du mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not doubt the accomplishment of the sƒÅdhana taught in other vehicles.

original: sngags rnams yid bzhin nor bu ltar bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu gcig tu ma nges pas so zhes so //
analyzed: sngags rnams yid bzhin nor bu ltar bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu gcig tu ma nges pas so zhes so //
translated: Because the result of accomplishing the mantras is not definite, like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor rnams //
analyzed: bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor rnams //
translated: The actions, conduct, and yoga

original: de rnams don la khyad med kyang //
analyzed: de rnams don la khyad med kyang //
translated: are not different in meaning,

original: sems can bsam pa tha dad phyir //
analyzed: sems can bsam pa tha dad phyir //
translated: but because the thoughts of sentient beings are different,

original: de bzhin phye nas bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin phye nas bstan pa'o //
translated: they are taught as divided.

original: 'gro la phan pa de nyid kyis //
analyzed: 'gro la phan pa de nyid kyis //
translated: By that very [means] he benefits beings.

original: 'gro kun sgyu ma ltar gsungs kyang //
analyzed: 'gro kun sgyu ma ltar gsungs kyang //
translated: Although all beings are said to be like illusions,

original: khrus la sogs pa dag 'dod pa //
analyzed: khrus la sogs pa dag 'dod pa //
translated: [Still] they desire bathing and so forth.

original: de la ci phyir bdag med bshad //
analyzed: de la ci phyir bdag med bshad //
translated: Why is it explained to them that there is no self?

original: sna tshogs thabs kyi rgyan rnams ni //
analyzed: sna tshogs thabs kyi rgyan rnams ni //
translated: The ornaments of various means

original: snying rje'i ro dang ldan pas ni //
analyzed: snying rje'i ro dang ldan pas ni //
translated: are endowed with the taste of compassion.

original: de phyir byang chub sems dpa' yis //üîΩsgyu @160a * //
analyzed: de phyir byang chub sems dpa' yis // sgyu @160a * //
translated: Therefore, the bodhisattva

original: ma'i gdan ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ma'i gdan ni bstan pa'o //
translated: teaches the illusory seat.

original: bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor la //
analyzed: bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor la //
translated: In the conduct of action and yoga,

original: gang zhig blo ni chags gyur pas //
analyzed: gang zhig blo ni chags gyur pas //
translated: one whose mind is attached

original: des ni tshogs bsag khyad par du //
analyzed: des ni tshogs bsag khyad par du //
translated: should accumulate the special accumulations

original: de las gsungs pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: de las gsungs pa'i las bya'o //
translated: and perform the actions taught in that [tantra].

original: dpa' bo'i 'khrugs pas gzhan 'joms sam //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i 'khrugs pas gzhan 'joms sam //
translated: Either conquer others through the agitation of the hero

original: yang na 'bros pa legs pa yin /
analyzed: yang na 'bros pa legs pa yin /
translated: or it is good to flee.

original: gnyis po spangs pa'i spyod pa de //
analyzed: gnyis po spangs pa'i spyod pa de //
translated: That conduct which abandons both

original: dgos pa med par ltung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: dgos pa med par ltung ba'i phyir //
translated: falls without purpose.

original: rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho'i nang nas shin tu rin chen cho ga 'di //
analyzed: rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho'i nang nas shin tu rin chen cho ga 'di //
translated: From within the ocean of the king of tantras, this extremely precious ritual

original: 'gro la phan phyir dpal ldan gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs bton //
analyzed: 'gro la phan phyir dpal ldan gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs bton //
translated: is taught for the benefit of beings, the sƒÅdhana of glorious YamƒÅri.

original: de phyir 'di las rang gzhan don du rab tu sgrub par gyis //
analyzed: de phyir 'di las rang gzhan don du rab tu sgrub par gyis //
translated: Therefore, for the sake of self and others, you should practice this well.

original: skabs don phan pa 'dod pa 'di las thos par mi 'gyur ram //
analyzed: skabs don phan pa 'dod pa 'di las thos par mi 'gyur ram //
translated: Will you not hear this, which is the meaning of the occasion, the desire for benefit?

original: 'di nyid byed pa sems kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis //
analyzed: 'di nyid byed pa sems kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis //
translated: This very one, the mind, in all its aspects,

original: lus can rnams kyi sems ni rang dbang spros pa la //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi sems ni rang dbang spros pa la //
translated: The mind of embodied beings is independent and discursive.

original: srid pa de srid thar pa rab tu khyad pa'i phyir //
analyzed: srid pa de srid thar pa rab tu khyad pa'i phyir //
translated: For as long as there is existence, there is the distinction of liberation,

original: blo yi nor ldan bla ma dag la thogs 'gyur ram //
analyzed: blo yi nor ldan bla ma dag la thogs 'gyur ram //
translated: So will you not be attached to the gurus who possess the wealth of the mind?

original: skye shi nad kyi chu rlabs 'khrugs pa'i phreng ba can //
analyzed: skye shi nad kyi chu rlabs 'khrugs pa'i phreng ba can //
translated: Having a garland of turbulent waves of birth, death, and sickness,üîΩMay beings here obtain the merit of the water of existence.

original: srid chu'i ster las skye bo'i bsod nams 'dir thob shog / bdag kyang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i skur ni rab gyur te //
analyzed: srid chu'i ster las skye bo'i bsod nams 'dir thob shog / bdag kyang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i skur ni rab gyur te //

original: srid pa gsum la phan byed ji srid nam mkha'i dbyings //
analyzed: srid pa gsum la phan byed ji srid nam mkha'i dbyings //
translated: Benefiting the three worlds for as long as space exists.üîΩThe nature of analyzing good and bad views, the nature of analyzing good and bad views,

original: bzang ngan rnam par dpyod pa'i rang bzhin grub mtha' dang // 'jam dpal zhabs kyi padma'i rdul tshogs mgos len cing ;
analyzed: bzang ngan rnam par dpyod pa'i rang bzhin grub mtha' dang // 'jam dpal zhabs kyi padma'i rdul tshogs mgos len cing ;
translated: Receiving on my head the dust of the lotus feet of Manjushri,

original: / sdig pa pra zhing chung la'ang 'jigs pa rab tu 'dzem //
analyzed: / sdig pa pra zhing chung la'ang 'jigs pa rab tu 'dzem //
translated: And even a small sin, he fears and avoids.

original: thos dang snying rje spyin dang bzod pa des tshim pa'i //
analyzed: thos dang snying rje spyin dang bzod pa des tshim pa'i //
translated: He, who is satisfied with learning, compassion, generosity and patience,

original: shes rab skyong gis dpal ldan gshin rje gshed tshogs bstan //
analyzed: shes rab skyong gis dpal ldan gshin rje gshed tshogs bstan //
translated: the protector of wisdom, has taught the glorious YamƒÅri.

original: gshin rje gshed kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: gshin rje gshed kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
